name: Bezier Bolero
description:
The dance of the Blobs... so in love. Here we wiggle ZIM Blob objects to Bolero by Ravel.

Note the efficient way that the title, Bezier Bolero can be found in the two checkboxes and the elegant ZIM Dial for controlling the animate rate.  What speed do you like for this fascinating NFT?
 
Dr Abstract is the Founder of ZIM at https://zimjs.com and the inaugural member of the Gadget Minters. See https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters for more info on the collective. Get collecting their pioneering interactive NFTs!
